Questions: Whom should be contact if we are not feeling well or sick in the hostel at night?

They will immediately take you to the Mission Hospital for treatment. If the situation is serious, your parents will be informed right away, and until then, the hostel authorities will take full care of you. All the medical procedures carried out in the Mission Hospital under such circumstances are free of cost for students.

Questions: Can I get immediate medical help after 10 PM?
RESPONSES: If you feel unwell or face any medical issue at night in the hostel, there are two DCs (Disciplinary Committee members) present on each floor to help you. They will immediately take you to the Mission Hospital for treatment. All the medical procedures carried out in the Mission Hospital under such circumstances are free of cost for students.

Questions: I made a payment, but it is not updated in ERP. What should I do?
RESPONSES: Contact the Fee Submission Department. Show your payment receipt/screenshot (if paid online) to any teacher in that department. They will verify and update it, after which your fee status will reflect on ERP.
